subject: Implement Phase 11: Range Selections & Sensitivity Analysis
body:
Adds comprehensive sensitivity analysis capabilities:

- Range Input Framework (11.1):
  - Low/Base/High input mode with color-coded fields
  - Slider-based variance adjustment
  - Variance patterns (conservative/moderate/aggressive)
  - Support for cost, revenue, margin, duration inputs

- Sensitivity Calculations (11.2):
  - Best/Base/Worst case scenario calculations
  - Break-even analysis with margin of safety
  - Input sensitivity ranking by impact
  - Monte Carlo simulation with triangular distribution

- Sensitivity Visualizations (11.3):
  - Tornado chart showing input sensitivities
  - Fan chart for projection ranges
  - Break-even margin visualization
  - Monte Carlo histogram with percentiles

New files:
- models/intercompany/sensitivity-analysis.js
- ui/intercompany/range-input.js
- ui/intercompany/sensitivity-visualizations.js

Integrates into calculator UI with new Sensitivity tab.
title: Implement Phase 11: Range Selections & Sensitivity Analysis
